title: Motley Fool Money: 08.03.2012
description: The government reports stronger-than-expected jobs growth.  Our analysts discuss the employment numbers and delve into earnings news from Procter & Gamble, General Motors, Kraft, Abercrombie & Fitch, Gap, LinkedIn, Blue Nile, and Zip Car.  Plus, David Kuo from The Motley Fool UK weighs in on the business of the Olympics.
